main event: Multiple UFO sightings were reported in Richmond, Virginia, from June 30 to July 1, 1962, with various witnesses observing different objects and lights in the sky.
interesting points: Witnesses reported seeing a large, bright, flashing light moving from east to west, hovering, then disappearing., Another sighting described an object that soared at extremely high speeds and changed colors from white to orange to red., One witness observed an object that seemed to be spinning across the sky at a high altitude., The reports noted that the UFOs were seen by multiple adult witnesses, indicating potential credibility., No photographs were recorded, but detailed descriptions were documented by the observers.
sighted object: various unidentified flying objects, including bright lights and circular shapes
witness description: Residents who reported seeing bright lights and unidentified flying objects in the sky during the specified dates.
